org.spongepowered.api.entity

Interface Item

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataHolder, Entity, EntityState, Identifiable

    public interface Item
extends Entity
    Represents an Item entity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDespawnTime()
      Gets the number of ticks remaining until this item despawns, or -1 if this item will never despawn.
      ItemStack getItemStack()
      Get the ItemStack that this item represents.
      int getPickupDelay()
      Gets the number of ticks remaining until this item can be picked up, or -1 if this item has an infinite pickup delay.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<User> getThrower()
      Gets the User who threw this item, if available
      void setDespawnTime(int time)
      Sets the number of ticks remaining until this item despawns.
      void setInfiniteDespawnTime()
      Sets an infinite despawn time for this item.
      void setInfinitePickupDelay()
      Sets an infinite pickup time for this item.
      void setPickupDelay(int delay)
      Sets the number of ticks remaining until this item can be picked up.
      void setThrower(User thrower)
      Sets the User who threw this item.

    • Method Detail

      • getItemStack

        ItemStack getItemStack()
        Get the ItemStack that this item represents.
        Returns:
        The represented ItemStack

      • getPickupDelay

        int getPickupDelay()
        Gets the number of ticks remaining until this item can be picked up, or -1 if this item has an infinite pickup delay.
        Returns:
        The number of ticks remaining, or -1

      • setPickupDelay

        void setPickupDelay(int delay)
        Sets the number of ticks remaining until this item can be picked up.

        If this item currently has an infinite pickup delay, the infinite pickup delay will be removed, and delay will be set instead.

        Parameters:
        delay - The number of ticks remaining

      • setInfinitePickupDelay

        void setInfinitePickupDelay()
        Sets an infinite pickup time for this item.

      • getDespawnTime

        int getDespawnTime()
        Gets the number of ticks remaining until this item despawns, or -1 if this item will never despawn.
        Returns:
        The number of ticks remaining, or -1

      • setDespawnTime

        void setDespawnTime(int time)
        Sets the number of ticks remaining until this item despawns.

        If this item currently has an infinite despawn delay, the infinite despawn delay will be removed, and time will be set instead.

        Parameters:
        time - The number of ticks remaining

      • setInfiniteDespawnTime

        void setInfiniteDespawnTime()
        Sets an infinite despawn time for this item.

      • getThrower

        com.google.common.base.Optional<User> getThrower()
        Gets the User who threw this item, if available

        If this item was not dropped from a player's inventory, then the thrower will not be available.

        Returns:
        The thrower, or Optional.absent()

      • setThrower

        void setThrower(@Nullable
                User thrower)
        Sets the User who threw this item.
        Parameters:
        thrower - The user who threw this item
